reviewText: My husband and I love Top Chef, and though season 6 was our favorite, this one is right up there! It's interesting to watch very talented chefs from the past seasons battling it out and also seeing how their personalities mesh. Favorites like Richard Blaze, Fabio and Carla have returned. Worth the money!
Title: N/A

reviewText: It usually takes me a few episodes to get into a season, possibly because I usually have to spend the first few episodes deciding what chefs I like that season. This season is all returning chefs from previous seasons, so I already had favorites going in, though some of the cheftestants I really liked in their respective seasons dissapointed and annoyed me this time around, and vice versa. The challenges always pushed the chefs to their limit this season, and were very entertaining to watch.
summary: Best Season of Top Chef Yet
Title: N/A

reviewText: My favorite season, so I wanted to have it in case I wanted to watch again.  Not sure I would buy any other seasons, but this one is good.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This was a great Top Chef. My husband and I enjoyed it a lot. The all stars were so wonderful.
Title: N/A

reviewText: It's a great show. Very talented chefs. Loved the challenges. I look forward to buying more seasons. I'm disappointed that several of the seasons weren't placed on DVD. I think there should have been a option to download the show or buy a DVD.
Title: N/A
